questions.quest-1: How can I participate in the contest?
questions.quest-2: How can I contribute to the project?
questions.quest-3: How can I volunteer for the project?

quest-1.reply: You can participate in the contest by submitting your folklore photos on the website. To Know more, please click to participate

quest-2.reply: You can contribute to the project by submitting your folklore photos on the website.
